ExposedCommands.Name: upgrade-notification
ExposedCommands.Description: Informs the user on critical updates

Configuration.Name: logging/root
Configuration.Description: Set the root log level to one of ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG.

Configuration.Name: container_config/memory_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's memory usage. Use a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte). If set, 80 % of the given memory will be allocated for the MySQL's most important performance variable `innodb_buffer_pool_size`. If unset, `innodb_buffer_pool_size` will receive 512 MB. Limits will only apply properly after re-creating the container.

Configuration.Name: container_config/swap_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's swap memory usage. Use zero or a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte). 0b will disable swapping.
